title_full: DALOPS01-BP01 Validate the data quality of source systems before transferring data for analytics
title: Validate the data quality of source systems before transferring data for analytics
description: Data quality can have an intrinsic impact on the success or failure of your organization's data analytics projects. To avoid committing significant resources to process potentially poor-quality data, your organization should understand the quality of the source data, and monitor the changes to data quality throughout the data pipeline. Data source validation can often be performed quickly on a subset of the latest data range to look for data defects such as missing values, anomalous data, or wrong data types.

title_full: DALOPS01-BP02 Monitor operational metrics of data processing jobs and the availability of source data
title: Monitor operational metrics of data processing jobs and the availability of source data
description: Data processing pipelines often consist of multiple steps that all need to run in sequence to output the desired data sets and meet business deadlines. Monitoring each job in the pipeline is key to ensure operational excellence. The operational metrics of the jobs themselves should be monitored, as well as the availability of source data, and that results are produced. Alert when new data has not arrived within the expected time and when data processing jobs don't complete on time or don't produce results.

title_full: DALOPS02-BP01 Use version control for job and application changes
title: Use version control for job and application changes
description: Using modern development practices, such as continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD), can help ensure that changes are rolled out in a controlled and repeatable way. Use version control systems to track changes to analytics jobs, ETL scripts, and application code. This enables rollback capabilities, change auditing, and collaboration across teams.

title_full: DALOPS02-BP02 Create test data and provision staging environment
title: Create test data and provision staging environment
description: Your team should use test automation to verify infrastructure, code changes, and data updates at every stage of your deployment lifecycle. Create representative test datasets and maintain staging environments that mirror production to validate changes before deployment.

title_full: DALOPS02-BP03 Test and validate analytics jobs and application deployments
title: Test and validate analytics jobs and application deployments
description: The analytics processing often requires management of complex workflows including job scheduling, managing dependencies between jobs, and monitoring jobs. Implement automated testing for analytics jobs and validate deployments before promoting to production. Use orchestration tools for data movement and job coordination.

title_full: DALOPS02-BP04 Build standard operating procedures for deployment, test, rollback, and backfill tasks
title: Build standard operating procedures for deployment, test, rollback, and backfill tasks
description: Document and automate standard operating procedures for common operational tasks including deployment, testing, rollback, and data backfill operations. This ensures consistent execution and reduces operational risk during changes to analytics workloads.
